properties.SQL Query:
SELECT
    IDMMBUSINESSDAY,
    BUSINESSDATE,
    ITEMID,
    TRANSACTIONID,
    DOCUMENTDATE,
    LINECODE,
    SAPDOCTYPE,
    SAPPOSTINGKEY,
    SAPCONTROLACCTCODE,
    LINETEXT AS "DESCRIPTION",
    GLNUMBER,
    SAPTAXCODE,
    SAPTAXBASEAMOUNT,
    CCCODE,
    SAPASSIGNMENT,
    CURRENCYCODE,
    AMOUNT,
    PRODUCT,
    DRAWNUMBER,
    CUSTOMER
FROM SPPL_DEV_DWH.SPPL_PUBLIC.SP_UBT_GETRTSHOPCLOUD
ORDER BY BUSINESSDATE, TRANSACTIONID, LINECODE;
